resources.string: This module can alter the built-in safety features that Google has implemented in Android Auto. By clicking \"I Agree\", you agree that YOU, and only YOU, are solely responsible for any negative repercussions that may result. This can include injury to yourself and/or others, property damage, or loss of life. Under no circumstances is the author of this module responsible for its use!"
Maximum # of screen taps while vehicle in motion before warning screen
Maximum speed before gps/wheel sensors think vehicle is parked
Number of pages shown in list views
Enable debug output to log to Xposed error.log
AA will use default background image
Browse your storage and select an image file
